name: Triopple Triadius - the Oppaidius Triple Triad Game!
name_original: Triopple Triadius - the Oppaidius Triple Triad Game!
description:
If you loved the card game from the Final Fantasy VIII RPG game but wished it had redrawn items from the Oppaidius Visual Novel series, then you're in luck!

This is all very basic, more a 'proof of concept', but it works, so have at it, I guess.
